description:
Packs up smaller than your waterbottle, this lightweight shelter offers protection in spaces too small for a tent. Waterproof and breathable fabric keep you protected while reducing condensation, so you stay comfortable and dry wherever you stop for the night.

  • Light and breathable 2-ply waterproof nylon ripstop top fends off dew, frost, and light precipitation
  • Lightweight 15-denier nylon bottom has an Xtreme Shield waterproof coating that won't degrade like traditional PU coatings
  • 91cm wide at the shoulder, tapering to 58cm at the foot
  • Basic design has a simple flap closure, no zip, no bug mesh
name: MSR Pro Bivy
